question: What are the main features of the Lightweight R4 Jacket?
answer: The Lightweight R4 Jacket is a windproof and stretchy jacket, featuring a Polartec Windbloc laminate sandwiched between a low-nap polyester microfleece face and a high/low grid polyester interior. It has unlaminated R1 underarm panels made with recycled polyester to enhance breathability and mobility. The jacket also has seamless shoulders for pack-wearing comfort, three external pockets (two handwarmers and one chest pocket), two internal drop-in pockets, and a drawcord hem. The jacket is lightweight, durable, and protects and warms the wearer.

question: What are some unique features of the Stormfront Pack?
answer: The Stormfront Pack is an ultra-simple waterproof pack made with a tougher, 840-denier double polyurethane-coated nylon fabric and a revolutionary easy-to-use waterproof zipper. It also features a custom-fit padded gear case with hook-and-loop dividers, a removable shoulder-strap harness, and a 3D spacer-mesh back panel. The pack is compatible with the vest portion of the Pack Vest and includes tool attachment and storage capabilities. An external mesh pocket holds a hydration reservoir, while an internal, zippered mesh pocket keeps valuables organized and extra dry.

question: What are the specifications and features of the micro puff vest?
answer: The micro puff vest is a high-loft vest offering cold-weather sanity through ultralight, compressible core warmth. It is insulated with superwarm and ultracompressible 100-gram PrimaLoft One, providing outstanding wet-weather performance and dry times. The vest features an ultralight, windproof shell and liner made from 100% all-recycled polyester with a Deluge DWR finish. It has pockets including zippered handwarmers and one interior, zippered self-storage pocket. The full-length front zipper has a Deluge DWR finish, backed with a low-bulk wind flap. The hem is adjustable with a drawcord.

question: What are the unique features of the Merino 2 dress?
answer: The Merino 2 dress is made from 73% merino wool wrapped around an all-recycled polyester (27%) core for a luxurious hand and enduring strength. It features a sleeveless A-line silhouette with wide shoulder straps for coverage, a center-front and center-back gathering detail for a flattering shape, and a hemline that hits just above the knee. The dress is slow-washed for next-to-skin softness and is machine-washable. The merino wool naturally resists odor, insulates even when wet, and regulates body temperature, while the all-recycled polyester core wicks moisture and controls odor. The 18.5 micron-gauge yarn and jersey-knit construction ensure a luxurious hand.
